ValidationRule.description: Ensure products are added before progressing opportunity from "Qualify" to "Propose" stage and beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( StageName ), Count_of_Opportunity_Line_Items__c = 0, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Propose"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This opportunity has no products. Please add product(s) by going to the product catalogue ("Add Pricing Products" button).
